description:
* Based on a romantic comedy light novel series written by http://anidb.net/cr68713 [Nagaoka Makiko] and illustrated by http://anidb.net/cr68716 [Magako].
http://anidb.net/ch128742 [Kashima Ryuuto] is a gloomy social outcast, and http://anidb.net/ch128743 [Shirakawa Runa] is a popular girl at school. Their relationship begins when Ryuuto has to ask Runa out as part of losing a game, and she ends up going out with him after saying "Well, I`m free right now, after all." They have completely different social circles, and completely different hobbies, but as they hang out with each other, they begin recognizing and even accepting those differences as something to bond over.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
When quiet nerd Ryuto Kashima`s friends force him to confess his feelings for popular girl Runa Shirakawa, his entire world is turned upside down when she actually agrees to date him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keiken Zumi na Kimi ni, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Kokuhaku Suru Hanashi.
Our Confession Story: The Experienced You and the Inexperienced Me
経験済みなキミに, 経験ゼロなオレが, 告白する話.

REGULAR.description:
Ryuto did start dating Runa, but Ryuto`s pals warn him that it`s "a joke for those popular types." Ryuto feels the cold stares of his classmates and worries he could get dumped at any moment as he starts planning his first date with his new girlfriend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keiken Zumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Hatsu Date Suru Hanashi.
Our First Date Story: The Experienced You and the Inexperienced Me
経験済みなキミと, 経験ゼロなオレが, 初デートする話.

REGULAR.description:
Ryuto is shocked when Maria, the girl who turned him down in junior high, suddenly transfers to his school. Ryuto struggles to keep his distance. Tough gyaru Nicole then surprises Ryuto even more with the news that his girlfriend`s birthday is coming up.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keiken Zumi na Kimi ni, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Surprise Suru Hanashi.
My Surprise for You Story: The Experienced You and the Inexperienced Me
経験済みなキミに, 経験ゼロなオレが, サプライズする話.

REGULAR.description:
When Ryuto boldly announces in class that he is Runa`s current boyfriend, Maria bolts from the room. Ryuto follows and asks her if she is responsible for the nasty rumors about Runa. Maria`s answer reveals a shocking connection between the two girls.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keiken Zumi na Kimi ni, Keiken Zero na Kimi ga, Shitto Suru Hanashi.
Our Jealousy Story: The Inexperienced You Gets Jealous of the Experienced You
経験済みなキミに, 経験ゼロなキミが, 嫉妬する話.

REGULAR.description:
Runa invites Ryuto to the beach to celebrate their one-month anniversary in the sun. When nervous Ryuto is just starting to relax with his radiant, bikini-clad girlfriend, a typhoon strands the two and forces them to spend the night together in an inn.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keiken Zumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Otomari Suru Hanashi.
Our Dating Story: The Inexperienced Me Spends the Night with the Experienced You.
経験済みなキミと, 経験ゼロなオレが, お泊まりする話.

REGULAR.description:
The person who called Ryuto to the gym at night was actually Maria. She confesses her desperation to become Ryuto`s first, even if that means dressing and acting like Runa. Ryuto is shocked. As the two talk it out, someone else watches from the shadows.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keiken Zumi na Kimi ga, Keiken Zumi na Dareka to, Uwaki Suru Hanashi?
Our Cheating Story: The Experienced You Cheats with an Experienced Someone Else?
経験済みなキミが, 経験済みな誰かと, 浮気する話?

REGULAR.description:
Ryuto adjusts to living in Runa`s great-grandmother`s house as the couple prepares for the upcoming summer festival. As the two work in the same shop during the day and sleep under the same roof at night, they start to imagine a possible future together.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keiken Zumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Natsumatsuri ni Iku Hanashi.
Our Festival Story: The Experienced You and the Inexperienced Me Go to a Summer Festival.
経験済みなキミと, 経験ゼロなオレが, 夏まつりに行く話.

REGULAR.description:
As school begins again, Ryuto and Runa invite their friends to play survival games. They discuss the approach of their three-month anniversary.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keiken Zumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Oretachi ga, Sabagee Suru Hanashi.
Our Survival Story: The Experienced You and the Inexperienced Us Play Survival Games.
経験済みなキミと, 経験ゼロなオレたちが, サバゲーする話.

REGULAR.description:
Runa volunteers for the culture festival pamphlet committee and invites Ryuto to join to advance "The Friendship Project" with Maria. While Runa and Maria disagree over design, Maria and Ryuto get carried away talking about their favorite streamers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keiken Zumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Issho ni Hashiru Hanashi.
Our Running Story: The Experienced You and the Inexperienced Me Run Together.
経験済みなキミと, 経験ゼロなオレが, いっしょに走る話.

REGULAR.description:
The Seirin culture festival has arrived! Ryuto hears a concerning rumor that Runa has a sugar daddy and tries to find out the truth alongside his friend from cram school.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Keiken Zumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Sorechigau Hanashi.
Our Different Story: The Experienced You and the Inexperienced Me Go Different Ways.
経験済みなキミと, 経験ゼロなオレが, すれちがう話.

REGULAR.description:
Things have been tense between Ryuto and Runa since the culture festival. Ryuto plans to tell Maria they can`t be friends anymore, but a shocking incident leads to a discovery that changes everything for Maria, Runa, and Ryuto. 
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Keiken Zumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Owakare Suru Hanashi.
Our Breakup Story: The Experienced You and the Inexperienced Me Break Up.
経験済みなキミと, 経験ゼロなオレが, お別れする話.

REGULAR.description:
With her relationship with Maria repaired, Runa dreams of her family living together again. She sets up a surprise dinner for her parents on Christmas Eve that, sadly, does not go as planned. Depressed, Runa asks Ryuto to stay overnight and comfort her.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Keiken Zumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Keiken Suru Hanashi.
Our Experience Story: The Experienced You and the Inexperienced Me Get Experienced.
経験済みなキミと, 経験ゼロなオレが, 経験する話.
Episode S1
Koga, Fukuhara, Kusunoki no Sannin ga, TV Anime "Kimizero" Housou Shuuban ni, AT-X de Tokubetsu Kikaku o Otodoke Suru Bangumi.
古賀, 福原, 楠木の３人が, TVアニメ「キミゼロ」放送終盤に, AT-Xで特別企画をお届けする番組.
Opening
Ending

WIKIPEDIA_JP: 経験済みなキミと、経験ゼロなオレが、お付き合いする話。

titles.title: Keiken Zumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Otsukiai Suru Hanashi.
Our Dating Story: The Experienced You and the Inexperienced Me
位于恋爱光谱极端的我们
位於戀愛光譜極端的我們
経験済みなキミと, 経験ゼロなオレが, お付き合いする話.
Kimizero
キミゼロ
Keikenzumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Otsukiai suru Hanashi.
经验丰富的你与经验为零的我交往的故事
